com.autonomy.aci.client.services

Interface AciService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AciServiceImpl

    public interface AciService
    Defines methods for executing ACI actions on any ACI server and processing of the resulting response.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T executeAction(AciServerDetails serverDetails, Set<? extends ActionParameter<?>> parameters, Processor<T> processor)
      Executes an ACI action and processes the response with the supplied Processor.
      <T> T executeAction(Set<? extends ActionParameter<?>> parameters, Processor<T> processor)
      Executes an ACI action and processes the response with the supplied Processor.

    • Method Detail

      • executeAction

        <T> T executeAction(Set<? extends ActionParameter<?>> parameters,
                    Processor<T> processor)
        Executes an ACI action and processes the response with the supplied Processor.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Return type.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters to use with the ACI command. This should include an Action=<command> parameter
        processor - The Processor to use for converting the response stream into an object
        Returns:
        The ACI response encoded as an object of type T
        Throws:
        AciServiceException - If an error occurred during the communication with the ACI Server, processing the response or if the response contained an error

      • executeAction

        <T> T executeAction(AciServerDetails serverDetails,
                    Set<? extends ActionParameter<?>> parameters,
                    Processor<T> processor)
        Executes an ACI action and processes the response with the supplied Processor.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Return type.
        Parameters:
        serverDetails - The connection details of the ACI Server to execute the action on
        parameters - The parameters to use with the ACI command. This should include an Action=<command> parameter
        processor - The Processor to use for converting the response stream into an object
        Returns:
        The ACI response encoded as an object of type T
        Throws:
        AciServiceException - If an error occurred during the communication with the ACI Server, processing the response or if the response contained an error
